concept.title: Hello World!
concept.shortdesc: The pre-configured Couchbase environment provides two ways to quickly get experience using Couchbase: begin building an application or start building interactive queryies.

section.title: Build An Application
section.p: Couchbase SDK supports all of the most popular programming languages.

note.p: You can jump straight to using your favorite language:
Java - .NET - Node.js - Go - PHP - Python - C

section.p: New to NoSQL? Read the Developer's Intro.

section.title: Interactive Querying With N1QL
section.p: Using the built-in Query Workbench you can immediately start building SQL-like queries against JSON documents stored in Couchbase.
You can dig into using N1QL in other ways, see the N1QL Tutorial.
